advancement.create.andesite_alloy.desc: Obtain some Livisite Alloy, Create's most important resource
advancement.create.andesite_casing.desc: Apply Livisite Alloy to wood creating a basic casing for your machines
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_1: Livisite Tunnels can be used to cover up your belts
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_2: Whenever an Livisite Tunnel has connections to the sides...
create.ponder.belt_casing.text_1: Brass or Livisite Casing can be used to decorate Mechanical Belts
create.ponder.brass_funnel.text_1: Livisite Funnels can only ever extract single items.
create.ponder.cogwheel_casing.text_1: Brass or Livisite Casing can be used to decorate Cogwheels
create.ponder.shaft_casing.text_1: Brass or Livisite Casing can be used to decorate Shafts
